title: [Moonsedge Castle, Library]
description: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves of dark-stained Ossian pine flank the arched entrance of the library, over which hangs a carved plaque.  Several tables sit in a clearing among the looming shelves, cluttered with open tomes and sheaves of paper.  The windows are imbued with swirls of carmine color that blunt the brilliance of the moonlight streaming in at the cost of staining it vividly red.
